events.message: The insured reported a collision involving their car and a streetlight on March 14th, seeking to file a claim for the damages incurred.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on keywords and reported incident details supplied by the insured.
A claims agent was assigned to handle the case specifically to provide dedicated assistance throughout the process.
The insurance company sent formal acknowledgment to the claimant confirming receipt of the accident claim and next steps.
Additional documents such as police reports, photos of damage, and repair estimates were requested from the claimant.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including the police report and vehicle damage photographs.
The claims team initiated an investigation to verify the facts of the car collision and assess the extent of damage.
The investigation was completed, confirming the validity of the claim and the damage estimate provided.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant covering the repair costs and other related expenses from the accident.
The claimant provided positive feedback on the clarity and timeliness of communication regarding the settlement offer.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company, allowing the payment process to begin.
Payment for the approved settlement amount was issued directly to the claimantâ€™s bank account.
The claim was officially closed following successful payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All claim files were archived for record-keeping and potential future reference in compliance with company policy.
